comment.author: 63929285@N07
comment._content:
Just a few points. This is not 'East Jordan' it is in the Hauran region of southern Syria. Second it is not Qarawat (I guess you meant Qanawat) but Suweida.
Third there is no mention that the house is enveloped by the colonnade of a Roman peripteral temple.
Fourth, see 'my 'Monuments of Syria' (3rd end 2009, I B Tauris, London) pages 288–289.
